comment: Cyclically shifting a closed walk as word of fixed length results in a closed walk as word of the same length (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 29-Apr-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 22-Mar-2022.)
